Force "active" the last 10s of Conjures *
* Conjures cannot be reliably detected in the last 10s. This setting forces them to appear as active during this time - even if the player unsummons them.

Overlay (Beta / Experimental)

Make sure to enable "Show Overlay" for this app in your Alt1 settings.

Enable Overlay - App will refresh when toggled. After overlay position has been set - you must leave this app open but you may 'Minimize' it by pressing the _ icon in the top right corner and move it out of the way.

The Overlay currently has a small delay. I'm working on improving this.


After clicking the button - move your mouse to where you want the overlay to appear then press alt+1 to set overlay to that position.

Interface Search Speed

Lower value will detect changes faster but may cause hits to overall performance. Adjust at your own risk - although if it causes any issues you can always slow it back down. It is heavily recommended to set this as low as you can without encountering performance issues.

**Requires a MANUAL RESTART of the app after adjusting.**

ms

Hard Reset

Sometimes I break localStorage. This will clear local storage, reset all settings to default, and reload the app in an attempt to fix things.
